author: Tom Bedford
title: Sony Xperia 1 II release date leaked: the media powerhouse could arrive 'later this month'
description: Sony's Spanish Twitter account may have just revealed the Xperia 1 II release window, and it could land before the end of April.
content:
The Sony Xperia 1 II or Xperia 1 Mark 2, to give it its less-confusing name is set to go on sale imminently, with a tweet from Sony itself suggesting the new media-powerhouse phone could arrive within the next couple of weeks.
This comes from Sony's Spanish-… [+1960 chars]
